{{include reference="EESCCode.ShareMacro" /}} {{velocity}} #* * EESC share a document * ----- * * This page propose to share an existing document. * * Author: Fabio MANCINELLI * Jean SIMARD *# ############################################## ## GLOBALS ############################################## ## HTTP REQUEST PARAMETERS #set($reqStep = $request.getParameter('step')) #if($request.getParameter('cancel')) #set($reqStep = 'cancel') #end #set($reqReferer = $request.getParameter('referer')) #if(!$reqReferer) #set($reqReferer = $request.getHeader('referer')) #end #set($reqSpaceName = $request.getParameter('spacename')) #set($reqDocumentName = $request.getParameter('documentname')) #set($reqRights = $request.getParameter('rights')) #set($reqUsers = $request.getParameterValues('users')) #set($reqGroups = $request.getParameterValues('groups')) ############################################## ## CONTROLLER ############################################## #controller() #macro(controller) #if($reqStep.equals('cancel')) #stepCancel($reqReferer) #elseif($reqStep.equals('form') && $reqSpaceName && $reqDocumentName) #stepForm($reqSpaceName) #elseif($reqStep.equals('share') && $reqSpaceName && $reqDocumentName) #stepShare($reqSpaceName, $reqDocumentName, $reqRights, $reqUsers, $reqGroups) #else #displayError() #end #end ############################################## ## ADD DATA ############################################## #* * Share the document * ----- * * Given the HTTP POST request, create the document with the rights that apply. * * @param $spaceName The name of the folder to create * @param $documentName The name of the document to create * @param $rights The type of restriction of the document ('public', 'shared' or 'private') * @param $users The list of authorized users if it apply (if $rights is 'shared') * @param $groups The list of authorized users if it apply (if $rights is 'shared') *# #macro(stepShare, $spaceName, $documentName, $rights, $users, $groups) #set($documentref = $services.model.createDocumentReference(${xcontext.mainWikiName}, $spaceName, $documentName)) #set($document = $xwiki.getDocument($documentref)) #set($shareobj = $document.getObject('EESCCode.CollaborativeDocumentClass')) #set($discard = $shareobj.set('scope', $rights)) #set($discard = $document.removeObjects('XWiki.XWikiRights')) ## Rights of the creator #set($object = $document.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', $document.creator)) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', 'view,edit,delete,creator')) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #if($rights.equals('public')) #set($object = $document.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', 'XWiki.ENTAllGroup')) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', 'view,edit')) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #elseif($rights.equals('shared')) ## Rights for the users #foreach($username in $users) #set($user = $xwiki.getDocument($services.model.resolveDocument($username))) #if($user.getObjectNumbers('XWiki.XWikiUsers') >= 1) #set($object = $document.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', $username)) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', 'view,edit')) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #end #end ## Rights for the groups #foreach($groupname in $groups) #set($group = $xwiki.getDocument($services.model.resolveDocument($groupname))) #if($group.getObjectNumbers('XWiki.XWikiGroups') >= 1) #set($object = $document.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', $groupname)) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', 'view,edit')) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #end #end #end #set($discard = $document.save()) #set($discard = $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($documentref, 'view', ''))) #end ############################################## ## VIEW ############################################## #* * Redirect to the referer * ----- * * Redirect the user to the page from where it was coming from. * * @param $referer The URL to redirect *# #macro(stepCancel, $referer) #set($discard = $response.sendRedirect($referer)) #end #* * Display error * ----- * * Display an error when the HTTP request is incomplete. *# #macro(displayError) {{error}} ${services.localization.render('eesc.DocumentShare.error')} {{/error}} #end #* * Display the form * ----- * * Display the form to the user * * @param $spaceName The optional space name that may have been given *# #macro(stepForm, $spaceName) #set($documentref = $services.model.resolveDocument("${reqSpaceName}.${reqDocumentName}")) #set($documentlink = "${reqDocumentName}") #set($message = ${services.localization.render('eesc.DocumentShare.message', ["${documentlink}", "${reqSpaceName}"])}) {{html clean='false'}}
